node.name: Task Tag Decorator
node.shortdescription:
In large projects there are a lot of task tags like TODO, FIXME, etc. and Eclipse provides only plain list of all these task tags which I think is difficult to use. "Task Tag Decorator" plugin is a simple plugin which can decorate "Package Explorer" view with icons or text decorations.

Supported Plug-ins:
- JDT
- CDT
- DLTK based plug-ins (Eclipse PHP, Ruby, JavaScript, Tcl). See http://wiki.eclipse.org/DLTK_Based_Projects for more info
- Any plug-in which uses Eclipse Resources API (only basic decoration)
